name: EnergyFormatter.Unit
desc: The units supported by the NSEnergyFormatter class.

items.name: case calorie
items.desc: The calorie unit. This unit is often used in chemistry. It is abbreviated as “cal.”

items.name: case kilocalorie
items.desc: The kilocalorie unit. This unit is used for food calories in some locales. In general, it is abbreviated as “kcal.” However, it may be abbreviated as “C” when used to represent food calories.
